AmountDC.name: AmountDC
AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company

AmountFC.name: AmountFC
AmountFC.description: Amount in the currency of the transaction

EntryID.name: EntryID
EntryID.description: Reference to header of the purchase entry

Expense.name: Expense
Expense.description: Expense related to the Work Breakdown Structure of the selected project. Only available with a professional service license

ExpenseDescription.name: ExpenseDescription
ExpenseDescription.description: Description of expense. Only available with a professional service license

From.name: From
From.description: From date to identify the range for accrued/deferred costs. This is used in combination with the property 'To' that defines the end date

IntraStatArea.name: IntraStatArea
IntraStatArea.description: IntraStat area (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatCountry.name: IntraStatCountry
IntraStatCountry.description: IntraStatCountry (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatDeliveryTerm.name: IntraStatDeliveryTerm
IntraStatDeliveryTerm.description: IntraStat delivery term (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatTransactionA.name: IntraStatTransactionA
IntraStatTransactionA.description: IntraStat transaction A (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatTransactionB.name: IntraStatTransactionB
IntraStatTransactionB.description: IntraStat transaction B (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the Belgium, Luxembourg, France & United Kingdom administration)

IntraStatTransportMethod.name: IntraStatTransportMethod
IntraStatTransportMethod.description: IntraStat transport method (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

PrivateUsePercentage.name: PrivateUsePercentage
PrivateUsePercentage.description: Percentage of re-invoice part of a cost to the owner of the company.

StatisticalNetWeight.name: StatisticalNetWeight
StatisticalNetWeight.description: Statistical NetWeight (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalNumber.name: StatisticalNumber
StatisticalNumber.description: Statistical Number (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalQuantity.name: StatisticalQuantity
StatisticalQuantity.description: Statistical Quantity (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalValue.name: StatisticalValue
StatisticalValue.description: Statistical Value (only relevant when IntraStat for purchase is enabled in the administration)

To.name: To
To.description: To date to identify the range for accrued/deferred costs. This is used in combination with the property 'From' that defines the start date

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Type: 30 = Purchase entry, 31 = Purchase credit note

VATAmountDC.name: VATAmountDC
VATAmountDC.description: VAT amount in the default currency of the company

VATAmountFC.name: VATAmountFC
VATAmountFC.description: VAT amount in the currency of the transaction. Use this property to specify a VAT amount that differs from the VAT amount that is automatically calculated.

VATBaseAmountDC.name: VATBaseAmountDC
VATBaseAmountDC.description: VAT base amount in the default currency of the company

VATBaseAmountFC.name: VATBaseAmountFC
VATBaseAmountFC.description: VAT base amount in the currency of the transaction

VATCode.name: VATCode
VATCode.description: VAT code. If this property is not filled, it will use the default VAT code of the G/L account property

VATNonDeductiblePercentage.name: VATNonDeductiblePercentage
VATNonDeductiblePercentage.description: If not the full amount of the VAT is deductible, you can indicate a percentage for the non decuctible part. This is used during the entry of purchase invoices.

WithholdingAmountDC.name: WithholdingAmountDC
WithholdingAmountDC.description: Withholding tax amount for spanish legislation

WithholdingTax.name: WithholdingTax
WithholdingTax.description: Withholding tax key for spanish legislation

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to create, read, update or delete the entry lines of purchase entries created for your purchase invoices.Note: Purchase entries are separated to header and line information. Endpoint PurchaseEntryLines is used for the line information.The relevance of properties is very much depending on the legislation and the package used.
